Headline: #26 South Shore Express and #100 Jeffery Manor Express Temporary Reroute at 106th/Mackinaw
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express & 100 Jeffery Manor Exp buses are rrtd via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Avenue M & 100th due to street blockage nr 106th/Mackinaw.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express and #100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Avenue M and 100th due to street blockage near 106th/Mackinaw.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Cicero. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Cicero.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
